attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people of britain Tony Blair has ruled this country for long enough and keeps promissing that he will leave. That was last year.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/resignTony/

The title of a petition must be a call to action, not just a name. '...petition the Prime Minister to Mr Tony Blair' does not make sense.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
